title: GMail Keeps Crashing Firefox Private Browsing
content:
Hello,

My Firefox keeps crashing when i try using GMail in Private Browsing. That is, 5 out of 10 times the browser crashes or becomes unusable.

I took my time to study it and this is what i know:

I can use the Private Browsing on other sites and it will work very well. Even on gmail.com, the Private Browsing works only when i don't type username or password of the GMail account. That is, the Private Browsing won't freeze when i choose a Google account from the highlighted accounts saved on the browser.

However, the browser freezes when i try typing a user name or password. I've tried typing the username very fast but the browser froze at the password section.

When the browser freezes, it isn't limited to the Private Browsing mode alone but the entire browser. I will be forced to shut down the browser via Task Manager. I'm using Firefox v131.0.2 (64-bit) which is the latest version as at this writing.

But i've also experienced this same issue with previous versions of Firefox, but it seems like the issue keeps getting worse with each update.

Back then, the browser freezes once in a while but now it freezes several times in a single day, which can be very very frustrating and super annoying (on blue days).

Please, I need a solution. It's just too much.
creator: slumwire

title: Firefox will use up a lot of memory as it is opened for a longer period of time
content:
I only opened 5 pages (fixed tabs), and only enabled two plug-ins, Proxy SwitchyOmega and AdGuard AdBlocker. The browser was always open, and the pages were static, and nothing was playing. The strange thing is that it didn't take up much memory at the beginning, but it took up more and more memory over time. Today the system got stuck and couldn't respond (it might be that the system used virtual memory).

I used the browser's task manager, which showed that the Shared Web Process memory of several pages was very high, some as high as 4G, and the GPU memory was also higher than before.

I think this is very strange. Why does the memory usage increase exponentially after the webpage has been there for a while?

My settings and usage habits have basically not changed. I didn't have this problem before, but it has appeared in the past six months. I have updated many versions, but the problem still exists. I have always used Firefox. If it continues like this, I will be very disappointed and have to make changes.
creator: robot-yang

title: Firefox is not loading webpages, refreshing the site multiple times then works
content:
Hi,

I'm having a weird issue with my firefox. Recently I've been having more common occurring issue, where my browser will fail to load a website, saying that I should check firewall, internet status, etc. On top of it, my youtube player's also been buffering way more and sometimes freezes the whole tab.

Now, I'm very certain that something is up with my firefox, because the same thing happens across 3 different computers on different networks (work pc, home pc and my laptop that I use on the go). The only common factor is my firefox account which I use to sync stuff (which is super convenient, by the way).

I've tested some other solutions that have worked for other users with the same problem, but to no avail. I'd appreciate any suggestions. Cheers
creator: mare.strazar

title: Revert to prior Firefox version (macbook Air running Sonoma 14.6.1 )
content:
I need to revert to the prior version - my Firefox updated automatically and now there's a bunch of stuff that make using it very hard for me.

Background - I have a TBI that limits my ability to process input. This new version has dropdowns on tabs that are useless and extraneous and make it hard for me to find what I need. I want the old version back so I don't get confused.

I got one response to my prior inquiry with some words and stuff that didn't make sense and when I tried to follow the "directions" what the response said would happen didn't. I tried to restart the search for how to fix this so I can function but it's been ignored for 5 days now.

CAN SOMEONE PLEASE TELL ME HOW TO GO BACK TO THE PRIOR VERSION which was working just fine PLEASE???
